variables.input:
timeseries avgCpu=avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), by:{dt.entity.host}, interval:1h
  | fieldsAdd interval
  | fieldsAdd host_name = entityName(dt.entity.host)
  | fieldsAdd azureVmSizeLabel = entityAttr(dt.entity.host, "azureVmSizeLabel")
  | filter isNotNull(azureVmSizeLabel)

| filter isNotNull(interval)
| fields host_name
| sort host_name asc

// Determine the per minute costing
| fieldsAdd denom=if(unitOfMeasure=="1 Hour",60,else:if(unitOfMeasure=="1 Day",24*60,else:1))
| fieldsAdd pricePerMinute = toDouble(retailPrice)/toDouble(denom)

// Hourly cost for the Azure SKU
| fieldsAdd cost=pricePerMinute*60

// Map to those hosts that are Azure VMs
| lookup [
  timeseries avgCpu=avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), by:{dt.entity.host}, interval:1h
  | fieldsAdd interval
  | fieldsAdd host_name = entityName(dt.entity.host)
  //| fieldsAdd additionalSystemInfo = entityAttr(dt.entity.host, "additionalSystemInfo")
  //| fieldsAdd azureResourceGroupName = entityAttr(dt.entity.host, "azureResourceGroupName")
  | fieldsAdd azureVmSizeLabel = entityAttr(dt.entity.host, "azureVmSizeLabel")
  | filter isNotNull(azureVmSizeLabel)
], sourceField:skuName, lookupField:azureVmSizeLabel, prefix:"cpu."

| filter isNotNull(cpu.interval)

| fieldsAdd `Status` = if(arrayMax(cpu.avgCpu) <= 10, "Idle", else:
  if(arrayMax(cpu.avgCpu) <= 50 AND arrayMax(cpu.avgCpu) > 10, "Moderate Use", else:
  if(arrayMax(cpu.avgCpu) <= 90 AND arrayMax(cpu.avgCpu) > 50, "Heavy Use", else:
  if(arrayMax(cpu.avgCpu) > 90, "Danger!", else: ""))))

| fieldsAdd cpuArray = toArray(cpu.avgCpu)
| fieldsAdd cpuScalar = iCollectArray(1 - 0.01*cpuArray[])
| fieldsAdd `Cost Projection ($)` = iCollectArray(cost*cpuScalar[])

// Add in filters
| fieldsAdd instanceFilter = if($InstanceType=="ALL","",else:$InstanceType)
| filter contains(skuName,instanceFilter)
| filter in(cpu.host_name,$HostName)
| summarize `Total Estimated Cost ($)`  = sum(arraySum(`Cost Projection ($)`)), by:{`Host Name`=cpu.host_name, `Instance Type`=skuName}
| sort `Total Estimated Cost ($)` desc

1.title: Instance Types
1.query:
timeseries avgCpu=avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), by:{dt.entity.host}, interval:1h
  | fieldsAdd interval
  | fieldsAdd host_name = entityName(dt.entity.host)
  | fieldsAdd azureVmSizeLabel = entityAttr(dt.entity.host, "azureVmSizeLabel")
  | filter isNotNull(azureVmSizeLabel)

| filter isNotNull(interval)
| filter in(host_name,$HostName)
| summarize `Count`=count(), by:{azureVmSizeLabel}
| sort `Count` desc

// Determine the per minute costing
| fieldsAdd denom=if(unitOfMeasure=="1 Hour",60,else:if(unitOfMeasure=="1 Day",24*60,else:1))
| fieldsAdd pricePerMinute = toDouble(retailPrice)/toDouble(denom)

// Hourly cost for the Azure SKU
| fieldsAdd cost=pricePerMinute*60

// Map to those hosts that are Azure VMs
| lookup [
  timeseries avgCpu=avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), by:{dt.entity.host}, interval:1h
  | fieldsAdd interval
  | fieldsAdd host_name = entityName(dt.entity.host)
  //| fieldsAdd additionalSystemInfo = entityAttr(dt.entity.host, "additionalSystemInfo")
  //| fieldsAdd azureResourceGroupName = entityAttr(dt.entity.host, "azureResourceGroupName")
  | fieldsAdd azureVmSizeLabel = entityAttr(dt.entity.host, "azureVmSizeLabel")
  | filter isNotNull(azureVmSizeLabel)
], sourceField:skuName, lookupField:azureVmSizeLabel, prefix:"cpu."

| filter isNotNull(cpu.interval)

| fieldsAdd `Status` = if(arrayMax(cpu.avgCpu) <= 10, "Idle", else:
  if(arrayMax(cpu.avgCpu) <= 50 AND arrayMax(cpu.avgCpu) > 10, "Moderate Use", else:
  if(arrayMax(cpu.avgCpu) <= 90 AND arrayMax(cpu.avgCpu) > 50, "Heavy Use", else:
  if(arrayMax(cpu.avgCpu) > 90, "Danger!", else: ""))))

| fieldsAdd cpuArray = toArray(cpu.avgCpu)
| fieldsAdd cpuScalar = iCollectArray(1 - 0.01*cpuArray[])
| fieldsAdd `Cost Projection ($)` = iCollectArray(cost*cpuScalar[])

// Add in filters
| fieldsAdd instanceFilter = if($InstanceType=="ALL","",else:$InstanceType)
| filter contains(skuName,instanceFilter)
| filter in(cpu.host_name,$HostName)

| fieldsRemove cpu.avgCpu, cpuArray, cpuScalar

// Determine the per minute costing
| fieldsAdd denom=if(unitOfMeasure=="1 Hour",60,else:if(unitOfMeasure=="1 Day",24*60,else:1))
| fieldsAdd pricePerMinute = toDouble(retailPrice)/toDouble(denom)

// Hourly cost for the Azure SKU
| fieldsAdd cost=pricePerMinute*60

// Map to those hosts that are Azure VMs
| lookup [
  timeseries avgCpu=avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), by:{dt.entity.host}, interval:1h
  | fieldsAdd interval
  | fieldsAdd host_name = entityName(dt.entity.host)
  //| fieldsAdd additionalSystemInfo = entityAttr(dt.entity.host, "additionalSystemInfo")
  //| fieldsAdd azureResourceGroupName = entityAttr(dt.entity.host, "azureResourceGroupName")
  | fieldsAdd azureVmSizeLabel = entityAttr(dt.entity.host, "azureVmSizeLabel")
  | filter isNotNull(azureVmSizeLabel)
], sourceField:skuName, lookupField:azureVmSizeLabel, prefix:"cpu."

| filter isNotNull(cpu.interval)

| fieldsAdd `Status` = if(arrayMax(cpu.avgCpu) <= 10, "Idle", else:
  if(arrayMax(cpu.avgCpu) <= 50 AND arrayMax(cpu.avgCpu) > 10, "Moderate Use", else:
  if(arrayMax(cpu.avgCpu) <= 90 AND arrayMax(cpu.avgCpu) > 50, "Heavy Use", else:
  if(arrayMax(cpu.avgCpu) > 90, "Danger!", else: ""))))

| fieldsAdd cpuArray = toArray(cpu.avgCpu)
| fieldsAdd cpuScalar = iCollectArray(1 - 0.01*cpuArray[])
| fieldsAdd `Cost Projection ($)` = iCollectArray(cost*cpuScalar[])

// Add in filters
